Firma pod menom <strong>KA-BE kovo s.r.o: The company KA-BE kovo s.r.o., has been operating in the market since 2006, leveraging the 30-year experience of Ľuboš Krajan, a graduate of ŠÚP in Kremnica, who continues to manage it to this day. Our work is based on the quality of professional contemporary and modern craftsmanship, which evokes a pleasant nostalgia for past metals. You can view our works in person at our showroom or by perusing our company catalogues. Within our profession, we specialize in various combinations, including wood, stone, glass, ceramics, and others.
Počas dlhoročnej praxe máme bohaté skúse: With years of practice, we have gained extensive experience in the following areas
brány / ploty / mreže / zábradlia / svie: gates / fences / grilles / railings / candlesticks / hinges / locks / handles / fireplace accessories...
nitovanie / tepanie / kalenie / zpreráža: riveting / hammering / hardening / riveting / restoration / folding / patination / enamelling...
povrchové striekanie / žiarové pozinkova: surface spraying (Surface Treatment and Protection) / galvanizing / various types of patination techniques / sandblasting / polishing / preserving / blackening...
